name: 2fast41button
description:
Hello player, and welcome to a new game.

I am the director of this game: 2 Fast 4 1 Button or 2F41B if you prefer.

You know Fornote, PIBJ, Mancraft, all those games that are played with so many BUTTONS !

So, I want you to play this game with ONLY one button. Of course, you can choose between the space bar, the left click on your mouse or A/B/X/Y on your favorite controller.

What ? You think I'm lying ? That it's a joke ?

Ok, the problem is, you're scared that you won’t be able to win this game with just one SINGLE little button.

This generation of players are so caught up in their time.

So I ask you just one more time, are you ready to take up the challenge ?

(Yes, I can)

Ok, that's better.

Take these shoes and this propellant.

And good luck, you’re going to need to be FAST!!!

(Alfa-50, InfiniX, Olaxe360, Maxibi, Flamergame)

2 Fast 4 1 Button is a race game, produced during the 1-bit GAME JAM 04/2021 by the Debilus Team, you are Billy, the famous gamer who tries to finish this game across different environments: Antarctic, plains, factory, and more, ...

Can you be the best runner ? The answer will be at the finish line. Thanks to SketchyLogic and SubspaceAudio for their music.

Proofreading by WizMeras
